pkgmetadata.longdescription: Identify Contaminants in Marker-gene and Metagenomics Sequencing Data // Simple statistical identification of contaminating sequence features in marker-gene or metagenomics data. Works on any kind of feature derived from environmental sequencing data (e.g. ASVs, OTUs, taxonomic groups, MAGs,...). Requires DNA quantitation data or sequenced negative control samples.
